message: I'm aiming for a slightly better outcome for myself this round, Alice. Let's secure a deal while the money's still worth something!
Come on, Bob! Meet me halfway before the money loses more value!
Alice, we're getting dangerously close to losing a significant chunk of this money. My offer is still on the table - let's be reasonable and close this deal.
I'm willing to compromise, but I still think I deserve the bigger share. Don't let the money slip away!
Alice, this is getting ridiculous. We're both losing out because of our stubbornness. I'm offering a near-even split. Take it before inflation eats away any more!
